name: Dicey's Adventure
description:
Dicey the Dice fell from the table and lost all his abilities! Help him and search the way around the toys and reach the trophy to recover them in this 3D Platformer Adventure. 

You need to find Dicey’s lost faces, find them and gain abilities.

Made in 50 hours for the GMTK Game Jame 2022.

PS: The Game is not quite finished, but we will continue to work on it :)
